name: calamondin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small orange with a sharp taste, originally grown in the Philippines and Indonesia, or the tree that the fruit grows on: The dessert was a great combination of ginger ice cream and sour calamondin. Some of the easiest citrus to grow are lemons, limes, and calamondin oranges.
More examplesFewer examplesBananas, calamondins, guava, papaya, and pineapples lend a distinctly tropical flair in many of the dishes.Cut each calamondin orange in half and remove the seeds.
